alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 04 at 8:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Arizona, including the following county, Pinal. * WHEN...Until 800 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 843 PM MST, local law enforcement continues to report flooding in the warned area, especially across Arizona City, where there are several roads impassable and vehicles stranded. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Casa Grande, Arizona City, Arizola and Toltec. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
